name: MEC Hut Slipper - Unisex
description:
After epic days of yo-yoing slopes or dry-tooling crags, your toes crave warmth and softness. The Hut Slippers have a Pertex Quantum nylon shell that’s designed to trap air and improve the efficiency of the synthetic insulation they’re packed with. Just slide your feet into a cloud of cozy and nestle them on a soft, squishy footbed.Uppers are Pertex Quantum ripstop nylon with TPU rands to protect against abrasion and DWR to shed light moisture.Nylon lining breathes well to keep your feet comfortable.100g polyester insulation in lining, upper and rand.9mm insoles are EVA foam for insulation that won’t crush underfoot.Soft polyester tricot footbeds for comfort.Textured TPU anti-slip soles for some traction.

        Sustainability
